name: RMVoice
0:
”Alexa, ask my bed to tv position.”
”Alexa, ask my bed to zero g”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my bed
des:
Control your Smart bed with your voice. 
Use your voice commands to control your Smart bed ( e.g., Zero-G, Under-bed light on&off, Increase or decrease massage intensity and so on). You can know how to use the voice control skills by asking Example Phrases, so that you can understand the use of the product more quickly.
This voice skill can perfectly realize all the control actions of the intelligent bed.
